Made me even more anti-social. Love every minute of it. 5/1

Jogo sensacional que parece não ter envelhecido! Até hoje há milhares de servers com o modo clássico de explodir e defusar bombas. A quantidade de brasileiros nesse jogo supera as 8000 unidades, o que ajuda e muito na conexão.
Simply the best tactical PVP shooter.. excellent

Hands down one of the best FPS ever created!! This is a game that was released in 2004 and today there are still over 20,000 players online, what more can i say!!
Great game, very fun to waste time on with a group of friends. Worth the money during a Steam Sale.
Still one of the best fps shooters

Enjoyable, simple, and well-structured FPS that can be considered a classic. A little dated but still updated to modern style and contains a variety of gameplay options and modes due to modding.  Must have! :D
Отличная игра вообще багов нету,читиров нету,крутая игра слов нету!
This game has been around for so long and yet it is always fun. Valve really knows how to make a good game.

Counter-Strike’s beauty is its simplicity: You play as a terrorist or a counterterrorist on a variety of maps. Once a match begins, you have to either wipe out the other team, free or hold hostages, or defend or blow up bomb sites to win the round. In the six years since its release, Valve has loved and maintained the graphics, sound, and physics engine of its baby, even if it’s not bleeding-edge anymore. Textures are detailed, the vocal work remains strong, nearby bullet-impact sounds still seem as if they’re happening within inches of you, and rag-doll physics still make your character realistically tumble after being hit by a grenade.

One of the best FPS games I have ever played. My only gripe with the game is that sometimes it doesn't seem like your bullets do anything because it takes a while to kill someone. This issue is only prevalent in Gun Game.

Play Gun Game...it's awesome.

Great game! Really recommend buying Garry's mod with it.
Prop hunt is really fun btw.

The game doesn't require that much of a learning curve. Noobs usually die a LOT....
Still gteat game.
One of the greatest games ever. Period. A must play.
Great game, fun to play but I really only use for TTT textures. Plays like a good old counter-strike game with the knife fights we all know and love.
Still as good as I remember it.

CS:S is a realy good sequel to 1.6. The graphics suit the gameplay very well. Very few bugs. Pretty balanced game overall as you can play decent with almost any weapon(but there are still some that are better then others of course). I personaly like the game pretty much, and it's a great alternative to the newly released CS:GO. They are very different titles, and you will feel different in either one. I totaly recomand CS:S to all counter-strike fans and as well to people who are new to tha franchise.
Yes i recommend this game, everyone has to get this game for these reasons. : Its needed for gmod as textures from the game. and this game is fun if you get the hang of it. Buy it! its a must.
This game is so good! If you love surfing then this is the game for you <3
Very Good Game ( is the best ) :D
The graphics really suck and movement is clunky. No tutorial. Get GO, I've heard it's better.
das spiel ist der hammer!! alle die das haben mal melden bei mir ;D
Mit Abstand der größte Klassiker auf Steam :)
A timeless classic that I, nor anybody else, will ever get bored of. The guns are powerful, the deaths are quick and almost everyone else out there is way too good at this game. It's crazy!

Perfect, funny game. Easy to learn. 10/10

+ graphics
+ physics
+ weapons
+ mods (CTF, DM, ...)

- achievements (hard to collect)
Отличная игра, всё проработано, очень много воспоминаний того, как всё начиналось (v34). Сейчас игра уже сбавляет обороты, но для меня она всегда останется одной из лучших игр в которые я играл!

Pretty much one of the best online games released for STEAM. This is the game that made me buy a gaming laptop in the first place. Great place to meet friends and have alot of fun. Find yourself a good clan you can hangout with frequently and it is totally worth your while to buy.
Recomendado el Juego Esta Muy bueno ! .
Игра отличная, олдскул. НО! 150 рублей по скидке 50% !?!?!?!?!? КАКОГО !?!?!?!? Ей красная цена 100 рублей без скидок! Советую ждать скидки побольше.
